column5: Well,  As many of you know we were expecting our second child and this morning (January 16) at exactly 6:16am we became happy parents of our second child....Too tired after not having a minute sleep over the past two days but mother and baby are doing fine. It was not an easy delivery, but they are both fine now. And Santa (who has been so good with me lately) delivering my new Lund a bit early, just delivered again...this time even better present. With new boat...great wife and two sons...How can anyone not be extremely happy with such boat/fishing crew?!!?  Here is the star of the night in his full glory:    Time to get some sleep. Cheers to all and look out for us in the new season and many more to come....   Ice Fisherman
Congrats to you and your family
Congrats Emil... I can see your smile from here bud !
Emil....great news!  Congrats to you and your entire family.  Sounds like a perfect crew to me.
Wow, congrats Emil! Seems like OFC is getting bigger every day! HH
Congratulations to you and your family! What a beautiful picture! Now go get some rest, you are going to need it!
Very good, Emil.  Congratulations to you and the proud Momma.
congrats on the new addition  Maureen
Great news Icefisherman!. I can recall years ago my parents told me to enjoy every minute with your children. They grow up fast. So true. I am so happy for you and your beautiful baby.

Awesome! remember the famous OFC saying... we like pictures and lots of them!!  perhaps we can turn this into a project... following the newborns life via images and video on a fishing website... we could make MILLIONS!  LOL  Glad to see Baby, Wife and our fisherman are all doing well!  Gerritt.
HEY CONGRATS !!!!!.  ..looks like another future fisherman ,and OFC member !!!!!
Congrats on the new arrival  rob
congrats
Hey.. hey.. hey... another fishing buddy....  WTG...  Congrat's to both you and your wife....
Glad to hear everyone is OK bud,now we can talk about taking that walk.....lol....TC....Chuck....
Congratulations, that's great news!
Congrats Emil.
Awesome!  Charles
That is awesome Emil.  I was wondering when you were going to post a thread.  I almost PM'd you again but here it is.  Congrats bud  Joey
Congrats! another oarsman!
Congrat's Emil, best wishes to all.

Congratulations on both new additions.  Do either have a name yet? Seems like not too long ago we had our first and last night we went to her high school registration? Time flies. Take it all in and enjoy every momoent.
That's great news, we should maybe consider starting a new forum for OFC babies considering how many there have been in the past few months...  Mike
